author: wn.com
title: 12 October 2015 - Farry supports workplace equality (Department for Employment and Learning)
text: ( Source : Department for Employment and Learning ) Employment and Learning Minister Dr Stephen Farry has delivered the opening speech at the Northern Ireland Diversity Champions event hosted by the Lloyds Banking Group . ~ Monday, 12 October
